 - #console #font a jeho velikost na Ubuntu

```bash
man 5 console-setup

# edituj soubor /etc/default/console-setup - ale v souladu s docs

# ACTIVE_CONSOLES="/dev/tty[1-6]"
# CHARMAP="UTF-8"
# CODESET="guess"
# FONTFACE="Terminus" # was: Fixed
# FONTSIZE="32x16" # was: 8x16
# VIDEOMODE=

# potom spustit
sudo dpkg-reconfigure console-setup
```

- #console #font na #archlinux
```bash
# temporary change
ls /usr/lib/kbd/consolefonts/
sudo setfont Lat15-Terminus16

# permanent change
# Edit or create the /etc/vconsole.conf file to specify a font permanently. For example:
FONT="Lat15-Terminus16x32"


```
